body_html:
@lhq1208 , I also meet the same error:
RuntimeError: [enforce fail at db.h:190] db_. Cannot open db: test of type lmdb Error from operator:
output: "dbreader_test" name: "" type: "CreateDB" arg { name: "db" s: "test" } arg { name: "db_type" s: "lmdb" }

have found out the solution?

2018-06-28: I found that I have compile with lmdb in windows. and fix it by compile with lmdb.
